name: 7 Seconds Platformer
description:
This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #32, where the theme was "Seven".

It is a platformer where you have approximately seven seconds to beat seven levels.

Controls :

- Left & Right Key or Left Joystick to move;

- Up Key or A/Cross to jump.

Get coins to add 1.5 seconds to the timer, reach the portals to progress to the next level.

Credits :

- Developed by Skwyni;

- Graphical assets from GDQuest, check their Youtube channel;

- Music from Juhani Junkala over on opengameart.org (typo in the in-game credits, put .com instead of .org).
